title: Pasadena Strawberry Festival is back this week with a massive shortcake and 50,000 visitors
content: More than 50,000 Pasadena residents and visitors will once again convene around a massive strawberry shortcake this week to celebrate the sweet fruit that is an icon in the city. Here's what to know about this year's event and how to get a slice of the world's largest strawberry shortcake.
